main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="8" y="0"></block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="20" y="169">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="controls_if">
        <mutation else="1"></mutation>
        <value name="IF0">
          <shadow type="logic_boolean" id="_@gnm*VMo.fH|W8L`+kA">
            <field name="BOOL">TRUE</field>
          </shadow>
          <block type="cbit_Button">
            <field name="pin">DigitalPin.P5</field>
            <field name="value">cbit_输入类.enButton.Press</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO0">
          <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
            <field name="name">DigitalPin.P0</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="1"></mutation>
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
                <field name="name">DigitalPin.P1</field>
                <value name="value">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="1"></mutation>
                    <field name="NUM">1</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <statement name="ELSE">
          <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
            <field name="name">DigitalPin.P0</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="1"></mutation>
                <field name="NUM">1</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_set_digital_pin">
                <field name="name">DigitalPin.P1</field>
                <value name="value">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="1"></mutation>
                    <field name="NUM">0</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
